subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: James Harden scored 17 points, and Stephen Curry had 14 in the United States national team’s 95-71 victory over Ukraine at the Basketball World Cup in Bilbao, Spain.
snippet: James Harden scored 17 points, and Stephen Curry had 14 in the United States national team’s 95-71 victory over Ukraine at the Basketball World Cup in Bilbao, Spain.
